sentences.pinyin: Wǒ shuō bú dìng kě yǐ qù.
sentences.translation: I might be able to go.

sentences.simplifiedText: 他说不定会喜欢这个礼物，那是他最喜欢的颜色.
sentences.traditionalText: 他說不定會喜歡這個禮物，那是他最喜歡的顏色.
sentences.pinyin: Tā shuō bú dìng huì xǐ huan zhè gè lǐ wù, nà shì tā zuì xǐ huan de yán sè.
sentences.translation: He might like this gift, that's his favorite color.
